name: Rush hour 1.2
description:
1.2 update: Major bugs fixes so game is playable

In this game you have to press to buttons to chose between one product and another depending on which one a customer wants. Give them the wrong one or take too long and you don't get any money. Get the max amount of money for each day to pass!

I made this as a recreation for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Made by me: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi05YNuocJ5ZzzIZeX5Y0Dw

Music by Evan King: https://www.youtube.com/user/EvanKingAudio

Made with theme "Out of Control" in less than 48 hours (update 1.2 was not made in the 48 time frame)
